caseTitle: Muzafar Iqbal v. Mst. Riffat Parveen & others
tagline: Discussion: (1) Section 100, 101, 108 & Order XLI CPC, (2) The judgment of the Appellate Court shall state the points for determination and the reasons for the decision. (3) The jurisdiction of a High Court under Section 100 CPC is meant to decide substantial question of law and not pure question of fact. (4) Distinction between the appellate jurisdictions under Section 96 and 100 CPC
